verses.verse: <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the Lord's <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not <S%H4480>so<s%> <S%H9527>short<s%> That it <S%H4480>cannot<s%> <S%H3467>save;<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> is His <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> <S%H3513>dull<s%> That it <S%H4480>cannot<s%> <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

But your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H914>made<s%> a <S%H914>separation<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and your <S%H430>God,<s%> And your <S%H9128>sins<s%> have <S%H5641>hidden<s%> [His] <S%H6440>face<s%> from you, <S%H4480>so<s%> that He does not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

For your <S%H3709>hands<s%> are <S%H1351>defiled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> And your <S%H676>fingers<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> Your <S%H8193>lips<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> Your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1897>mutters<s%> <S%H9390>wickedness.<s%>

<S%H369>No<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H7121>sues<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H8199>pleads<s%> <S%H530>honestly.<s%> They <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H8414>confusion,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>lies;<s%> They <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief,<s%> and <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

They <S%H1234>hatch<s%> adders' <S%H1000>eggs<s%> and <S%H707>weave<s%> the spider's <S%H6980>web;<s%> He who <S%H398>eats<s%> of their <S%H1000>eggs<s%> <S%H4191>dies,<s%> And [from] that which is <S%H2115>crushed<s%> a <S%H660>snake<s%> <S%H1234>breaks<s%> <S%H1234>forth.<s%>

Their <S%H6980>webs<s%> will not <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H899>clothing,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will they <S%H3680>cover<s%> themselves with their <S%H4639>works;<s%> Their <S%H4639>works<s%> are <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> And an <S%H6467>act<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> is in their <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H9563>evil,<s%> And they <S%H4116>hasten<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> Their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity;<s%> <S%H7701>Devastation<s%> and <S%H7667>destruction<s%> are in their <S%H4546>highways.<s%>

They do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in their <S%H4570>tracks;<s%> They have <S%H6140>made<s%> their <S%H9350>paths<s%> <S%H6140>crooked;<s%> <S%H3605>Whoever<s%> <S%H1869>treads<s%> on them does not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> is <S%H7368>far<s%> from us, And <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> does not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> us; We <S%H6960>hope<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> For <S%H5054>brightness,<s%> but we <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H653>gloom.<s%>

We <S%H1659>grope<s%> along the <S%H7023>wall<s%> like <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5787>men,<s%> We <S%H1659>grope<s%> like those who <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> We <S%H3782>stumble<s%> at <S%H6672>midday<s%> as in the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> Among those <S%H820>who<s%> are <S%H820>vigorous<s%> we are like <S%H4191>dead<s%> men.

<S%H3605>All<s%> of us <S%H1993>growl<s%> like <S%H1677>bears,<s%> And <S%H1897>moan<s%> <S%H1897>sadly<s%> like <S%H3123>doves;<s%> We <S%H6960>hope<s%> for <S%H4941>justice,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none,<s%> For <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> [but] it is <S%H7368>far<s%> from us.

For our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> Thee, And our <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against us; For our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are with us, And we <S%H3045>know<s%> our iniquities: <S%H5771><s%>

<S%H6586>Transgressing<s%> and <S%H3584>denying<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H5472>turning<s%> <S%H5472>away<s%> from our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1696>Speaking<s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H5627>revolt,<s%> <S%H2029>Conceiving<s%> [in] and <S%H1897>uttering<s%> from the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And <S%H4941>justice<s%> is <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> And <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>away;<s%> For <S%H571>truth<s%> has <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> in the <S%H7339>street,<s%> And <S%H5228>uprightness<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H935>enter.<s%>

Yes, <S%H571>truth<s%> is <S%H5737>lacking;<s%> And he who <S%H5493>turns<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H7997>makes<s%> himself a <S%H7997>prey.<s%> Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> And it was <S%H7489>displeasing<s%> in His <S%H5869>sight<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

And He <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> And was <S%H8074>astonished<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H6293>intercede;<s%> Then His own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>brought<s%> <S%H3467>salvation<s%> to Him; And His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5564>upheld<s%> Him.

And He <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> like a <S%H8302>breastplate,<s%> And a <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> on His <S%H7218>head;<s%> And He <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> for <S%H8516>clothing,<s%> And <S%H5844>wrapped<s%> Himself with <S%H7068>zeal<s%> as a <S%H4598>mantle.<s%>

<S%H5921>According<s%> to [their] <S%H1578>deeds,<s%> <S%H5921>so<s%> He will <S%H9608>repay,<s%> <S%H2534>Wrath<s%> to His <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to His <S%H340>enemies;<s%> To the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> He will <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H1576>recompense.<s%>

So they will <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from the <S%H4628>west<s%> And His <S%H9202>glory<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> For He will <S%H935>come<s%> like a <S%H9495>rushing<s%> <S%H5104>stream,<s%> Which the <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5127>drives.<s%>

"And a <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> And to those who <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H6588>transgression<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And as for Me, <S%H384>this<s%> is My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> "My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is upon you, and My <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H2233>offspring,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H2233>offspring<s%>'s offspring," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "from <S%H6258>now<s%> and <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"
